ype":"address","name":"to","type":"address"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"stok","type":"uint256"}],"name":"unStake","outputs":[{"internalType":"bool","name":"","type":"bool"}],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"unpause","outputs":[{"internalType":"bool","name":"success","type":"bool"}],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"staker","type":"address"}],"name":"withdrawUnstakedTokens","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"}],"devdoc":{"kind":"dev","methods":{"getRoleAdmin(bytes32)":{"details":"Returns To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}."},"getRoleMember(bytes32,uint256)":{"details":"Returns one of the accounts that have `role`. `index` must be a value between 0 and {getRoleMemberCount}, non-inclusive. Role bearers are not sorted in any particular way, and their ordering may change at any point. WARNING: When using {getRoleMember} and {getRoleMemberCount}, make sure you perform all queries on the same block. See the following https://forum.openzeppelin.com/t/iterating-over-elements-on-enumerableset-in-openzeppelin-contracts/2296[forum post] for more information."},"getRoleMemberCount(bytes32)":{"details":"Returns the number of accounts that have `role`. Can be used together with {getRoleMember} to enumerate all bearers of a role."},"getStakeUnstakeProps()":{"details":"get fees"},"getTotalUnbondedTokens(address)":{"details":"get Total Unbonded Tokens","params":{"staker":": account address"}},"getUnstakeEpochTime()":{"details":"get unstake epoch time"},"grantRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role."},"hasRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Returns `true` if `account` has been granted `role`."},"initialize(address,address,address,uint256)":{"details":"Constructor for initializing the LiquidStaking contract.","params":{"pauserAddress":"- address of the pauser admin.","sAddress":"- address of the SToken contract.","uAddress":"- address of the UToken contract."}},"pause()":{"details":"Triggers stopped state. Requirements: - The contract must not be paused."},"paused()":{"details":"Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise."},"renounceRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `account`."},"revokeRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role."},"setFees(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Set 'fees', called from admin","params":{"stakeFee":": stake fee","unstakeFee":": unstake fee Emits a {SetFee} event with 'fee' set to the stake and unstake."}},"setMinimumValues(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Set 'minimum values', called from admin","params":{"minStake":": stake minimum value","minUnstake":": unstake minimum value Emits a {SetMinimumValues} event with 'minimum value' set to the stake and unstake."}},"setSTokensContract(address)":{"details":"Set 'contract address', called from constructor","params":{"sAddress":": stoken contract address Emits a {SetContract} event with '_contract' set to the stoken contract address."}},"setUTokensContract(address)":{"details":"Set 'contract address', called from constructor","params":{"uAddress":": utoken contract address Emits a {SetContract} event with '_contract' set to the utoken contract address."}},"setUnstakeEpoch(uint256)":{"details":"Set 'unstake epoch', called from admin","params":{"unstakeEpoch":": unstake epoch Emits a {SetUnstakeEpoch} event with 'unstakeEpoch'"}},"stake(address,uint256)":{"details":"Stake utokens over the platform with address 'to' for desired 'utok'(Burn uTokens and Mint sTokens)","params":{"to":": user address for staking, utok: number of tokens to stake Requirements: - `utok` cannot be less than zero. - 'utok' cannot be more than balance - 'utok' plus new balance should be equal to the old balance"}},"unStake(address,uint256)":{"details":"UnStake stokens over the platform with address 'to' for desired 'stok' (Burn sTokens and Mint uTokens with 21 days locking period)","params":{"to":": user address for staking, stok: number of tokens to unstake Requirements: - `stok` cannot be less than zero. - 'stok' cannot be more than balance - 'stok' plus new balance should be equal to the old balance"}},"unpause()":{"details":"Returns to normal state. Requirements: - The contract must be paused."},"withdrawUnstakedTokens(address)":{"details":"Lock the unstaked tokens for 21 days, user can withdraw the same (Mint uTokens with 21 days locking period) Requirements: - `current block timestamp` should be after 21 days from the period where unstaked function is called."}},"version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{},"version":1}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"/home/aditimahesh/Documents/Work/Persistence/go/src/github.com/persistenceOne/pStakeSmartContracts/contracts/LiquidStaking.sol":"LiquidStaking"},"evmVersion":"istanbul","libraries":{},"metadata":{"bytecodeHash":"ipfs"},"optimizer":{"enabled":true,"runs":200},"remappings":[]},"sources":{"/home/aditimahesh/Documents/Work/Persistence/go/src/github.com/persistenceOne/pStakeSmartContracts/contracts/LiquidStaking.sol":{"keccak256":"0x6199fb4d3245fb5419ca5cfea1b2a9b92a1c34f39b19c52189d5b0d7bd941e5e","license":"UNLICENSED","urls":["bzz-raw://1e8b1106e76c0c63f8f4a90de82faa4084b41b1fb3883f0d0531bb3a3f751ac2","dweb:/ipfs/QmXZsmmZgLtg3W6Bz2rqT3X5skJe7d7t7pJyoNmcmggrco"]},"/home/aditimahesh/Documents/Work/Persistence/go/src/github.com/persistenceOne/pStakeSmartContracts/contracts/interfaces/ILiquidStaking.sol":{"keccak256":"0xb5e694d7bcfbf29bd9c7cb014a10503207ec106a081d45e97dd1116fba20798f","license":"UNLICENSED","urls":["bzz-raw://f71e2c9a5f419e664e490ec6f5c2e728ae0dc95d2c368aad6caa871d75d6dab9","dweb:/ipfs/QmQnuFq6mowQCXe7zFZdxjH15J3epMD44WdsdCZGRj8Pu8"]},"/home/aditimahesh/Documents/Work/Persistence/go/src/github.com/persistenceOne/pStakeSmartContracts/contracts/interfaces/ISTokens.sol":{"keccak256":"0x6d1fd6074a5a4449f6c49d82fb7399d4e2b569ce258aeecdcf8746d4fec57cde","license":"UNLICENSED","urls":["bzz-raw://51abdd7397507d60a46e2bfde632346cec1b45aed99905795b2c24e323490bfe","dweb:/ipfs/QmRpeDB7kAmTyQf4yipR68uySw9xPwG37wZjj1UjXkETw1"]},"/home/aditimahesh/Documents/Work/Persistence/go/src/github.com/persistenceOne/pStakeSmartContracts/contracts/interfaces/IUTokens.sol":{"keccak256":"0x63ce5857b8decefc8d894b38f66ab115291aa39f29e1426b27ab79b9f797a43a","license":"UNLICENSED","urls":["bzz-raw://6b69f4fa86b1f39884a8d5640893f046a76c311c49afb1e42535f838efa34e84","dweb:/ipfs/QmVPk1NhEwBKKpPQe8dMGFFeQbeUPQm3FvYuGz6wjRpSPE"]},"@openzeppelin/contracts-upgradeable/access/AccessContr  @param staker: account address

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

getRoleMember(bytes32,uint256).details: Returns one of the accounts that have `role`. `index` must be a value between 0 and {getRoleMemberCount}, non-inclusive. Role bearers are not sorted in any particular way, and their ordering may change at any point. WARNING: When using {getRoleMember} and {getRoleMemberCount}, make sure you perform all queries on the same block. See the following https://forum.openzeppelin.com/t/iterating-over-elements-on-enumerableset-in-openzeppelin-contracts/2296[forum post] for more information.

getRoleMemberCount(bytes32).details: Returns the number of accounts that have `role`. Can be used together with {getRoleMember} to enumerate all bearers of a role.

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role.

initialize(address,address,address,uint2.details: Constructor for initializing the LiquidStaking contract.

pause().details: Triggers stopped state. Requirements: - The contract must not be paused.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `account`.

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role.

params.unstakeFee: : unstake fee Emits a {SetFee} event with 'fee' set to the stake and unstake.

params.minUnstake: : unstake minimum value Emits a {SetMinimumValues} event with 'minimum value' set to the stake and unstake.

params.sAddress: : stoken contract address Emits a {SetContract} event with '_contract' set to the stoken contract address.

params.uAddress: : utoken contract address Emits a {SetContract} event with '_contract' set to the utoken contract address.

params.unstakeEpoch: : unstake epoch Emits a {SetUnstakeEpoch} event with 'unstakeEpoch'

stake(address,uint256).details: Stake utokens over the platform with address 'to' for desired 'utok'(Burn uTokens and Mint sTokens)

params.to: : user address for staking, utok: number of tokens to stake Requirements: - `utok` cannot be less than zero. - 'utok' cannot be more than balance - 'utok' plus new balance should be equal to the old balance

unStake(address,uint256).details: UnStake stokens over the platform with address 'to' for desired 'stok' (Burn sTokens and Mint uTokens with 21 days locking period)

params.to: : user address for staking, stok: number of tokens to unstake Requirements: - `stok` cannot be less than zero. - 'stok' cannot be more than balance - 'stok' plus new balance should be equal to the old balance

unpause().details: Returns to normal state. Requirements: - The contract must be paused.

withdrawUnstakedTokens(address).details: Lock the unstaked tokens for 21 days, user can withdraw the same (Mint uTokens with 21 days locking period) Requirements: - `current block timestamp` should be after 21 days from the period where unstaked function is called.
